```{r}
brfss_2008_cleaned <- brfss_2008_cleaned |>
  rename(over_40_person_had_ma = rfmam2y,over_50_person_had_mam = mam502y)
brfss_2008_cleaned
```
```{r, replicate Figure A.1, fig.align='center'}

dist_mam <- brfss_2008_cleaned |>
  group_by(age) |>
  summarize(n = n())

dist_mam2 <- brfss_2008_cleaned |>
  filter(hadmam == 1)|>
  group_by(age) |>
  summarize(mam_ct = sum(hadmam))

dist_mam <- dist_mam |> 
  cbind(dist_mam2$mam_ct) |>
  rename(mam_ct = 'dist_mam2$mam_ct') |>
  mutate(share = mam_ct/n)
  
dist_mam |>
ggplot(aes(age, share, fill = "BRFSS Survey"))+ 
  geom_point(color = "grey")+
  geom_line(color = "grey")+
  xlim(35, 50)+
  scale_y_continuous(breaks=seq(0, 0.7, by = 0.1))+
  labs(x = "Age", y ="Share who had a mammogram",
       title = "Mammogram rate in survey and claims data, by age")+
  theme_minimal()


```
